Name: Jump Pack
Description: Perfect Dodge timing increases by 50%.

Name: Winged Fury
Description: Damage from Melee Attacks executed while sprinting or dashing increases by 25%.

Name: Auxiliary Arsenal
Description: Secondary Weapon's Damage increases by 15%.

Name: Perseverance
Description: While performing Charged Attacks, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back.

Name: Squad Cohesion
Description: Jump Pack Dash damages enemies along its trajectory.

Name: Smiting Angel
Description: Ground Pound's Damage increases by 10%.

Name: Wings of Flame
Description: Jump Pack Dash damages enemies along its trajectory.

Name: Pride in Duty
Description: After a Finisher, Ground Pound deals 25% more Damage for 10 seconds.

Name: Ample Ammunition
Description: Any use of Jump Pack reloads the equipped Ranged Weapon.

Name: Overcharge
Description: Damage of Charged Attacks increases by 15%.

Name: Retribution
Description: After you are grabbed or knocked back, you deal 15% more Melee Damage for 10 seconds.

Name: Knowledge of the Enemy
Description: Melee Damage increases by 15% against Majoris- or Extremis-level enemies.

Name: Strategic Strikes
Description: After a Ground Pound, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back for 10 seconds.

Name: Hammer of Wrath
Description: After a Ground Pound, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back for 10 seconds.

Name: Manoeuvrability
Description: Jump Pack recharges 20% faster.

Name: Diligence
Description: A fully prepared Ground Pound deals 20% more Damage, but preparation time increases by 25%.

Name: Ascension
Description: Jump Pack Leap deals Damage to all enemies in the takeoff area.

Name: Armour Reinforcement
Description: Non-Finisher Gun Strikes also restore Armour.

Name: Consecutive Execution
Description: Killing 15 enemies in rapid succession restores Equipment Charge by 1. Cooldown is 180 seconds.

Name: Act of Attrition
Description: Enemies hit by Melee Attacks take 10% more Damage for 3 seconds.

Name: Proven Efficiency
Description: All Squad Members deal 50% more Gun Strike Damage.

Name: Precision Strike
Description: Ground Pound deals 100% more Damage, but its radius is reduced by 50%.

Name: Zealous Blow
Description: A Ground Pound kill restores Jump Pack's Charge by 10%.

Name: Aerial Grace
Description: After a perfectly timed Dodge using a Jump Pack Dash, you deal 25% more Damage for 5 seconds.

Name: Commitment
Description: A perfectly timed Dodge using a Jump Pack Dash restores Jump Pack's Ability Charge.
